mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM REVIEW
SELECT M.*, R.* FROM REVIEW R, MOVIE M WHERE R.MV_NO = M.MV_NO ORDER BY R.RV_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (RV_NO, MV_NO, NO, RV_NICK, RV_TITLE, RV_CONTENT, RV_DATE, RV_REC, RV_RATE, WARN) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mvNo }, #{no}, #{rvNick}, #{rvTitle}, #{rvContent}, SYSDATE, 0, #{rvRate}, 0)
